Name: tha-groupfromthesoc-la
Author: Group From The Society Of Graduates Of Thai Universities And Institutes

Translations.Text: læa pen thi nænxn ying rea di sng nuhˌ pi yang hmu chn khxng khea dangnan khea di klaw wa xo hmu chn khxng chan xey phwk than cng khearph phakdi xallxhˌ theid sahrab phwk than nan mimi phracea xun dı nxkcak phraxngkh dangnan phwk than ca mi yakerng (kar lngthosʹ khxng phraxngkh) hrux

læw hawhna khxng brrda phu ptiseth sraththa nı hmu chn khxng khea di klaw khun wa khea phu ni michı khır xun nxkcak pen puthuchn khn thrrmda chen deiyw kab phwk than pheiyng tæ khea txngkar thi ca thataw hı di den henux phwk than læa ha kxallxhˌ thrng prasngkh læw nænxn phraxngkh ca thrng sng ma la xik ahˌ lng ma rea mi khey diyin kha phud chen ni nı smay brrphburusʹ khxng rea tæ kal kxn ley
khea midi pen xari nxkcak pen khn ba dangnan phwk than cng xdthn khxy khea sak raya wela hnung
nuhˌ di klaw wa kha tæ phracea khxng kha phraxngkh khx phraxngkh thrng pord chwyhelux kha phraxngkh dwy pheraa phwk khea ptiseth mi yxm cheux kha phraxngkh

dangnan rea cung wa hiyˌ kæ khea hı tx reux phay tı sayta khxng rea læa kha sang khxng rea læa meux kha baycha khxng rea di ma thung na nı tea k ca deuxd phung cea cng brrthuk thuk chnid khxng satw pen khu «læa khrxbkhraw khxng cea dwy nxkcak phu thi kha daras di banthuk wi kxn læw (hı hayna) nı hmu phwk khea (thi mi yxm sraththa) læa cea xya di khx chwyhelux kha nı brrda phu thi xthrrm thæcring phwk khea ca thuk hı cm natay
khran meux cea læa phu thi xyu rwm kab cea di khun pi xyu bn reux læw k cng klaw theid wa brrda kar srrseriy pen khx ngxallxhˌ phu sung thrng hı rea rxdphn cak hmu chn phu xthrrm

Læa cng klaw theid wa kha tæ phracea khxng kha phraxngkh khx phraxngkh thrng hı kha phraxngkh lng cak reux dwy kar lng thi mi khwam careiy læa phraxngkh theanan pen phu leis ying hæng brrda phu hı lng cak reux
thæcring nı kar nan yxm pen sayyan khx teuxnsti mak hlay læa thung mæwa rea pen phu thdsxb pwng baw khxng rea
læw hlangcak phwk khea rea di bangkeid chn xik klum hnung (phwk xad)

dangnan rea di sng rx su l khn hnung (hud) khxng phwk khea pi yang phwk khea doy klaw wa phwk than cng khea rph phakdi xallxhˌ theid sa hab phwk than nan mimi phracea xun dı nxkcak phraxngkh dangnan phwk than ca mi yakerng (kar lngthosʹ khxng) phraxngkh hrux
